hero.description: Supercharge Your Git Workflow with the only tool that lets you manage simultaneous branches and review every commit before merging—without disrupting your existing process.

main-features.title: Parallel Branches
main-features.description: You don’t need to switch or stash branches if you can work on several simultaneously. Fix your bug while you work on your feature.

main-features.title: Stacked Branches
main-features.description: Break a big feature into small, dependent branches, making reviews faster and integrations incremental.

main-features.title: AI Assistance
main-features.description: Let AI handle the busywork: generate branch names, commit messages, and pull request descriptions automatically.

main-features.title: Unlimited Undo
main-features.description: GitButler makes a snapshot before every operation, allowing you to go back in time to any previous point without fear of losing anything.

main-features.title: Commit Editing
main-features.description: Easily edit, reorder, squash, or split commits in any branch, even after pushing to remote.

main-features.title: Git(Hub|Lab) Integration
main-features.description: Open Pull Requests, generate PR messages with AI, automatically check PR statuses and more with our forge integrations.

ai-features.title: Native AI Integration
ai-features.description: Choose from different AI models and thinking modes with built-in prompt templates for seamless development.

ai-features.title: AI-Powered Automation
ai-features.description: AI automatically creates commits with generated messages and intelligently renames branches based on your work.

ai-features.title: Parallel AI Workflows
ai-features.description: Run multiple AI agents simultaneously on different branches - write tests on one while documenting another.

ai-features.title: Smart Context Management
ai-features.description: Jump between AI sessions instantly and continue conversations on any branch while others run in background.

ai-features.title: Intelligent Task Management
ai-features.description: Watch AI progress with real-time todo extraction and clean, collapsible tool execution views.

ai-features.title: Advanced Cost Monitoring
ai-features.description: Track token usage and AI provider costs per branch in real-time to manage your spending.
